name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Coin: Always be up to date

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Monitoring the quotes of the main currencies in the world.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Follow the quotation of several world currencies with this simple and practical extension. You will be able to choose which quotation you want to monitor through an intuitive interface, receiving, in real time, updates of the chosen quotation, which will be updated automatically and periodically.
